title: India US trade deal: US shares India map with POK Aksai Chin
desc: While releasing the trade deal details, the US trade representative's office released a map of India showing the entire Jammu and Kashmir, including Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (POK), as part of the country. Here's why it is important and marks a departure.

title: 2-way player Daniss Jenkins scores 18 points as Pistons rout Knicks, 118-80
desc: Daniss Jenkins scored 18 points in his last game as a two-way player and the Detroit Pistons routed New York 118-80 on Friday night to end the Knicks’ winning streak at eight games

title: Swatch unveils Valentine’s Day specials with a heart-powered design that reveals both sides of romance
desc: When it comes to Valentine’s Day, we’re always celebrating how love is patient, kind, romantic and magical, but it’s easy to forget that love can also be dramatic, messy, wild, and just blah. This is why Swatch is changing things up this romantic season, with a two special V-Day designs, inspired by love’s sweet chaos. […]

title: Celts rally from 22-point deficit to edge Heat, 98-96
desc: Jaylen Brown had 29 points while Payton Pritchard scored 24 points to help the Boston Celtics make their biggest comeback of the season, rallying from a 22-point deficit to defeat the Miami Heat 98-96
